name: Extension
title: CS Extension
notes:
**Note 1**:  Use code 360 for extension involving the mucosa only of adjacent sites.  Use higher codes for extension involving the deeper tissues of the primary or adjacent sites.

**Note 2**:  Use code 300 for localized tumor only if no information is available to assign code 105 or 360.
